DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial is designed to provide additional information on the safety and tolerability of vildagliptin (50 mg once daily (qd)) when used in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) and moderate or severe renal insufficiency.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Vildagliptin Versus Placebo in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes and Moderate or Severe Renal Insufficiency
DOC.criteria: History T2DM Moderate or Severe Renal Impairment Glucose > 270 mg/dL (>15 mmol/L) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
